resources.string: Sorry, it looks like you\'re not eligible for BOO!.
Hold Anywhere to take a video
Short Press to take a photo
BOO! requires access to your photos to save it.
It seems like something wrong with your network.
Upload your Contacts to find more friends.
Please enter a valid email address to secure your account.
You didn\'t allow access to your photos. Please go to: Settings->Privacy->BOO! to enable library access.
You have been signed out. Please log in again.
Log out error , exit and retry.

By continuing, you agree to the
By continuing, you agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy.
I\'d like to keep it private.
Your username must start with a letter.
Your username must be between 6-20 characters.
This username has already been taken.
This phone number has already been taken.
Usernames can\'t be ended with underline.
Your password must be between 6-20 characters.
Your number won\'t be displayed publicly.
Please enter a valid email address.
This email is already associated with a username.
This phone number has not been registered.
This email has not been registered.
The remark name cannot be empty
Use BOO! account to sync Boomoji & BOO! to enjoy a better experience.
We will send you an SMS verification code.
I don\'t have a phone number.

The email will be used to secure your account. Is it correct?
Please choose how you want to reset your password.
We will send a verification code to this email.
A verification code has been sent to
Just a minute. One more step we\'ll finish this!
The code will be delivered via SMS or a phone call.
Be who you want to be
Get more exclusive stickers on BOO!
Allow access to your photos to choose from library and save photos to your camera roll. To continue, you\'ll need to allow photos access in Settings.
Allow photo access to choose from library and save photos to your camera roll.
Please grant those permissions for a wonderful experience.
BOO! can be used normally only after you have granted permissions.
A system issue occurred. Please try again.
Allow storage access in Settings->Apps->BOO! to use BOO! features?

Allow phone access in Settings->Apps->BOO! to log in to BOO!? BOO! accesses your phone book to verify your mobile and device ID, so as to ensure your login is not compromised. BOO! doesn\'t call other numbers or end your call.
BOO! Would Like to Access Your Camera
BOO! requires camera access to record video.
Allow camera access to take pictures, record videos, and scan Boocard. To continue, you\'ll need to allow camera access in Settings.
Allow camera access in Settings->Apps->BOO! to use camera to take pictures, record videos, and scan Boocard?
BOO! Would Like to Access Your Microphone
BOO! requires microphone access to record sound.
Allow microphone access to record videos, video chat, and more. To continue, you\'ll need to allow microphone access in Settings.
Allow microphone access in Settings->Apps->BOO! to record videos, video chat, and more?
BOO! Would Like to Access Your Contacts

When you connect BOO! with your phone contact list, you\'ll be able to see a list of your contacts who are on BOO!. From there, you can choose contacts to add, so you need to have your contacts periodically uploaded and stored on our server. Disconnect anytime to stop uploading.

To help you find friends easier on BOO!, you can choose to have your contacts periodically uploaded and stored on our server. You can find which contacts to add friends. Disconnect anytime to stop uploading.
Allow contacts access in Settings->Apps->BOO! to find more friends? BOO! only use your contacts to help you make finding friends on BOO! easier.
BOO! Would Like to Send You Notifications
Notifications may include alerts, sounds, and icon badges. These can be configured in Settings.
Get notifications for new boos? Tap to enable notifications.
BOO! Would Like to Access Your Location
Please enable your Location Access to help you find friends easier from your school, and even discover more fun filters.
Allow location access to help you find schoolmates easier and let you discover filters. To continue, you\'ll need to allow location access in Settings.
Allow location access to share your location to help you getting together with friends easier. To continue, you\'ll need to allow location access in Settings.
Enable Location Access to find your school.
You May Pick the Schools Below
You have friends at this school.
Please make sure to enter the full name of your school.
Couldn\'t find your school? Try searching for it with the Full Name of your school. If it still isn\'t showing, Don\'t worry! You can email us.
My school isn\'t listed. And here is the school info:
1. The full name of my school:
2. The city where my school is located:
Please note: You won\'t be able to change your school info within 60 days.
Please confirm your school info. Once you confirm it, you won\'t be able to change it within the next 60 days.
Wow you have so many friends! We\'re sorry that if you want to add new friends please remove some first.
Oh no! He/She has reached the friend limit. We\'re sorry that you can\'t request for now.
Wow you have so many friends! We\'re sorry that if you want to accept new friends please remove some first.
Oh no! He/She has reached the friend limit. We\'re sorry that you can\'t accept for now.
Choosing who can see your profile

Maybe you\'ve never counted how many days we spent together. But we know! Since the first day we met. It\'s been %s days and our love for you has never faded away. We\'re sorry that we weren\'t aware you are not satisfied until you want to leave.
You\'ll need to email us to let us know what\'s up. After we confirm it, we\'ll help you to delete the account.
You\'ll need to delete the posts on Days by yourself for the security reasons.
Your phone number and email will be unbounded. But you can still use them to sign up on BOO!.
Keep in mind that you can\'t sign up with the same username, because we can\'t recover deleted account.
I want to delete my account.
We\'re sorry to hear you\'d like to remove your account.
Before you go, please tell us why:
PLEASE NOTE: Deleting your account is a permanent and irreversible move. After the account is deleted, there is no option to recovery.
Boomoji is your animated 3D avatar. Create an expressive avatar and pick from a huge library of stickers featuring you and your friends.
You haven\'t created your Boomoji yet!
You already have a BOO! account! Log In
Bump with friends and add them easier!
You can add 5 items at most.
It took too long time to add friend by bumping? You can try to restart Bluetooth or add friend in the other way.
Allow SMS access in Settings->Apps->BOO! to send messages to your friends via BOO! directly? BOO! will not send any SMS to others without your permission.
They won\'t be able to send messages to you on BOO!. We won\'t let them know you blocked them.

Welcome to the public group. Public group is a place that you can meet new friends with similar interests around the world.
Public groups can be searched and found with tags. Anyone can join! Before you start we would like you to know inappropriate contents and behaviors are forbidden here.
If you break the rules and be reported, we\'ll block you after we confirm it. That means you can\'t join in any public groups ever. Please be respectful and friendly, now have fun!
You\'re dismissed as group admin of %s.
You\'re set as group admin of %s.

Days is a personal social network not a public social media. Only the friends you accept can see your posts. It\'s private and safe. Share your daily life with close friends, and see what they\'re up to.
Days is only visible to friends.
If disabled, you won\'t receive any post notifications from your friends.
Share Your Day & See What Friends Up to
Share your story of daily life. Follow your friends to see what\'s up to. And Let\'s hang.
Days is a personal social network. Only the friends you accept can see your posts. Share your daily stories in Days now! And see what friends are up to.

Enable Location Access to play games with friends nearby.
The chats will be removed if you and players haven\'t been chatting in 48 hours.
1. Each player will get 1000 scores at the very beginning of the season.
2. You\'ll get 20 experience points if you win, and you\'ll lose 20 experience points if you lose.
3. 1 season, 1 week. Each season will be ended on every Sunday 11:59:59 PM PST time.
1. 1 season, 1 week. Each season will be ended on every Sunday 11:59PM PST time.
1. Co-op Games are for partners. You and your partner need to collaborate together to win experience points.
2. 1 season, 1 week. The experience points will be zeroed when each season ends.
Play games with friends to win experience points. Experience points raise your level. The more experience points you earn, the higher level you get!
You\'ll be awarded with the Badges while your levels hit up. And Badges recognize your unique game skills. The higher level you get, the higher badge you win.
You\'ve got a new message in Games.
New game - %s is online! Have fun, together! |270c|ï¸

Be nice and be respectful. No swearing, No bullying and No cursing. If you find the one you chat do as above, please [Block]

Are you sure you want to quit the game? Your current score will be cleared.
Or you can copy & paste this link to groups, IG bio, Snapchat story, TW or FB to share with friends!
For the â€˜Battle Games\', it shows the ranks of players based on the scores in last season. 1 season, 1 week.
For the â€˜Challenge Games\', it shows the ranks of players based on the best scores in last season. 1 season, 1 week.
For the â€˜Battle Games\', it shows the ranks of players based on the total scores in each season.
For the â€˜Challenge Games\', it shows the ranks of players based on the best scores in all seasons.
The players who reach the tier of Diamond, Master and King will gain the badge for souvenir at the end of the season of tier.
1 season, 1 month and the tier points will be cleared on 1st every month(12:00 AM PST).
Get Double Tier Points by playing any games in 1 hour.
Get Double Tier Points by playing any games in 1 day.
Get Double Tier Points by playing any games in 5 days.
If you die in challenge games, you can get an extra life once and continue playing with this card.
Block your opponentâ€˜s sight for seconds. (Only for some Battle Games)
Shake the screen of your opponent for seconds. (Only for some Battle Games)
Reduce 50%% time of opponent\'s timer for 2 rounds.
Freeze your opponent for seconds. (Only for some Battle Games)
You will get the badge of The Bright Diamond when you reach the Diamond Tier(repeatable) at the end of the season.
You will get the badge of The Master Honer when you reach the Master Tier(repeatable) at the end of the season.
You will get the badge of The King of Game when you reach the King Tier(repeatable) at the end of the season.
You will get the badge of Challenge Game Insider when you play any challenge games in total for 1000 times.
You will get the badge of Battle Game Insider when you win any battle games for 500 times.
You will get the badge of The Beginner when you play 30 games.
You will get the badge of The Popular when you get 30 friends.
Get 75 TP for 1 time in a challenge game
Play battle games with 3 friends in chat rooms
Get 5000 scores in any battle game
Be global top 1 in a game at the end of season
Be global top 100 in a game at the end of season
Be global top 3 in a game at the end of season
Win any battle games for %s times
Play any challenge games for %s times
This is the first season. Stay tuned and check it out on next week.
This is the first season. Stay tuned and check it out on next month.
7 TIERS: Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Diamond, Master, King.
There are many divisions in each tier, I is the highest. But the divisions in the King can be continuously accumulated.
Raise your tier by gaining tier points(TP) in Battle Games or Challenge Games.
The mission lasts for a month, the player who reaches the Diamond(or above) will get the counterpart badge at the end of the season.

The mission lasts for a month, the player who reaches the Diamond(or above) will get the counterpart badge at the end of the season. And the tier points will be cleared on 1st every month(12:00 AM PST).

Connecting the next generation to make the world a better place.
BoBo is passionate and full of energy, always ready to embrace new things and changes! He is honest and brave, but he likes pranking his friends.
Never one to shy away from attention, Bella is outgoing, positive, and loves being around with animals. She always brings a lot of joy to Boo Family.
Max always stands by 24/7 for friends. He is warm-hearted but a little bit self-conscious. He\'s always trying to lose weight, but can\'t resist delicious food.
Merry is kind of shy. She prefers staying at her own space, but she loves using BOO! to share and connect with friends.
Charlie is a genius and obsessed with science & new technology. He enjoys playing games with friends, but his favorite hobby is to invent cool stuffs at his own workshop.

We are sorry this beta version of Public Group has made some users feel disturbed. The Public Group aims to provide a safe and fun community for all users who have similar interests. For that purpose, we need to optimize this feature to make this place more enjoyable. The new version will be online soon, stay tuned!
